meaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>mouth</radical> coming out of the top of a <radical>tree</radical> so you go into <kanji>shock</kanji>. Your brain just can't comprehend what's in front of you.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>shock</kanji> you've suffered results in you needing to stay <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう) from now on. You don't get to travel, explore, or even get groceries. You're homebound from now on, buddy.
